text: Maxwell Scherrer Cabelino Andrade (born 27 August 1981), known as Maxwell, is a Brazilian former professional footballer who played as a left-back. He works for Paris Saint-Germain as assistant sporting director. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== :Source: Club Season League Cup League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps
